00029 const unsigned int MAX_BYTE_LENGTH = 4; // UTF-8 has character with length at most 4 byte, and other encoding such as EUC-JP and Shift-JIS are at most 2 byte.
00030 }
00031 
00035 void testGetByteCount(JMA_CType* ctype, const char* str)
00036 {
00037     cout << "########## test method getByteCount()" << endl;
00038     cout << "raw string:" << endl << str << endl << endl;
00039 
00040     char unit[MAX_BYTE_LENGTH+1];
00041     unsigned int bc = 0; // byte count
00042     unsigned int cc = 0; // character count
00043 
00044     cout << "characters delimited by space:" << endl;
00045     for(const char* p=str; *p; p+=bc, ++cc)
00046     {
00047         bc = ctype->getByteCount(p);
00048         if(bc == 0 || bc > MAX_BYTE_LENGTH)
00049         {
00050             cerr << "invalid byte count: " << bc << endl;
00051             exit(1);
00052         }
00053 
00054         for(unsigned int i=0; i<bc; ++i)
00055             unit[i] = *(p+i);
00056         unit[bc] = 0;
00057 
00058         cout << unit << " ";
00059     }
00060 
00061     cout << endl << endl << "character count: " << cc << endl << endl;
00062 
00063     size_t len = ctype->length(str);
00064     if(cc != len)
00065     {
00066         cerr << "the character count is not equal to JMA_CType::length(): " << len << endl;
00067         exit(1);
00068     }
00069 }

00074 void printUsage()
00075 {
00076     cerr << "usage: ./test_jma_ctype --encode [eucjp,sjis,utf8] testFile" << endl;
00077 }

00082 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00083 {
00084     if(argc != 4)
00085     {
00086         printUsage();
00087         exit(1);
00088     }
00089 
00090     if(strcmp(argv[1], "--encode") != 0)
00091     {
00092         cerr << "unkown command option " << argv[1] << endl;
00093         printUsage();
00094         exit(1);
00095     }
00096 
00097     Knowledge::EncodeType encode = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(argv[2]);
00098     if(encode == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00099     {
00100         cerr << "unkown encode type " << argv[2] << endl;
00101         printUsage();
00102         exit(1);
00103     }
00104 
00105     JMA_CType* ctype = JMA_CType::instance(encode);
00106 
00107     ifstream from(argv[3]);
00108     if(! from)
00109     {
00110         cerr << "erro open file: " << argv[3] << endl;
00111         exit(1);
00112     }
00113 
00114     string line;
00115     if(! getline(from, line))
00116     {
00117         cerr << "no input string for test method getByteCount()" << endl;
00118         exit(1);
00119     }
00120     testGetByteCount(ctype, line.c_str());
00121 
00122     return 0;
00123 }
